sections.title: What are AI agents
sections.body: An agent receives a goal plans steps acts with tools observes outcomes writes to memory and returns a result. The loop repeats until the goal is met. The core cycle is Think Act Observe Reflect.

sections.title: Tool study
sections.body: Tools expand what agents can do. Study each tool purpose strength ideal use type and how to connect. Load a tool into the Composer to try it in a simple chain.
